abstract: Rising concern over concussions in synchronized swimming testifies to growing awareness of head injuries among all athletes; sport presents unique challenges to identifying concussions as many serious collisions occur out of sight, below water's surface.
lead_paragraph: Concussions, usually the concern of contact sports such as football and hockey, have become a worry in the pool, as synchronized swimmers perform more moves in tighter formations.

headline.main: Synchronized Swimmers Find Danger Lurking Below Surface: Concussions
headline.print_headline: Below the Ballet, a Hidden World of Head Trauma

snippet: Concussions, usually the concern of contact sports such as football and hockey, have become a worry in the pool, as synchronized swimmers perform more moves in tighter formations....
